name: Bullets! (LNT Games)
description:
Bullets! is a game made by two friends, the idea originating from a middle school game project that eventually became something more.

Avoid bullets, lasers, and all manner of dangerous, high-velocity projectiles in this bullet-hell inspired platformer! Unlock new characters as you progress through increasingly challenging swarms of bullets!

Will you make it to the other side?

Additional Information
  • The game is built only for Windows systems.
  • Found a bug? Got a question or feedback? Post a comment or send us an email at longneckturtlegames@gmail.com.
  • Want to play local multiplayer with players far away? Not sponsored, but Parsec is an amazing program for this.

And most importantly...

Enjoy!
